name: Pika
short_description: Pika is a fast, lightweight, dynamic multi-paradigm programming language. Its list of features includes: First Class Functions, Closures, Lexical Scoping, Optimized Tail Calls, Classes, Cooperative threads, Packages, Properties and Exceptions.
